1.template article - compass article, xml template format on server


{locale}/r/{*path} content/help/contentpolicy.xml content/help/contentpolicy.zh-cn.xml


2.dynamic article - article that stored in database


{locale}/r/{groupname}/comments/id show article content


3.{locale}/hot


get hot article list for all groups


4.{locale}/r/{groupname}


e.g. /en-us/r/game get article list under group name equals game


5.{locale}/r/{groupname}/hot


get hot article list for a specific group


6.{locale}/{user}


get article list for specific user
